channel.title: No-Ip Help (serious question)
channel.description: i found out that i cant use my no-ip because my dads firewall and he refuses to take it off, im connecting to him through a wireless connection and i want to host a server, is there anyway i can get past his firewall to host my server??

item.title: No-Ip Help (serious question)
item.dc:creator: @NG_DESIGNZ NG DESIGNZ
item.description:
@NG_DESIGNZ wrote:

we use different comps, im connected to him, i think when he is out ima change his firewall to allow port 43594 or can some1 tell me if thats right or what i have to do?[br][size=1]Posted on: September 09, 2007, 06:50:50 AM[/size][hr]some1 plz help

HELP ME[br][size=1]Posted on: September 09, 2007, 07:50:57 AM[/size][hr]bump- did to get attention to post

Read full topic

lol… yeh ur ***** just get a adminstrive acc on ur comp and turn it off…

item.title: No-Ip Help (serious question)
item.dc:creator: @dj_litch dj litch
item.description:
@dj_litch wrote:

same problem happened to me try and get on ur dads computer when he logged on go onto useraccounts and change ur space to administrater this will give you full access to the firewall

Read full topic

item.title: No-Ip Help (serious question)
item.dc:creator: @PkLite PkLite
item.description:
@PkLite wrote:

Nope. Unless you can use some type of connection remote. This would allow you to take off his firewall. Other than that, you would have to turn it off manually.

Read full topic
